#summary An open source utility for testing the efficiency of Go-based tweens or any other tween engine.

For more about !TweenBencher see the [http://go.mosessupposes.com/?p=5 post].


[http://go.mosessupposes.com/wp-content/uploads/2007/10/tweenbencher-thumb1.jpg]


Benchmark charts comparing various tween engines can be seen here: [http://www.goasap.org/info.html#benchmarks]
